attributes.action: Consider The Elderly In Their Own Homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Elderly people have one major fear and that is to be taken from the home they own or rent and to be placed in a nursing home, for the remaider of their life, which means a lonely existance for many because some families do not bother to visit them. 

Full time care in the home is vital for all our elderly because one day when we are elderly, we may need the same care and consideration.

rejection.details: Your petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
